android.gameengine.icadroids.objects.collisions

Interface ICollision

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MoveableGameObject

    public interface ICollision
    Every object that wants Tile collision needs to implement this interface. A MoveableGameObject implements this method by itself, so instead of implement, override this method when you're extending MoveableGameObject.
    Author:
    Bas van der Zandt

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void collisionOccurred(List<android.gameengine.icadroids.tiles.Tile> collidedTiles)
      This method will be triggered when there has been a collision with a tile.

    • Method Detail

      • collisionOccurred

        void collisionOccurred(List<android.gameengine.icadroids.tiles.Tile> collidedTiles)
        This method will be triggered when there has been a collision with a tile. Note: sometimes you must use undoMove(); , or the object will get stuck into the wall!
        Parameters:
        collidedTiles - Every collided tile will be provided in this list. You can directly manipulate the tiles, or, if you want to know which side the object has collided with the tile, use the method getCollisionSide(); .
